name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a versatile Senior UX Engineer with extensive experience in UX/UI design, I excel in enhancing user experiences through robust prototyping and wireframing techniques using **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Adobe Creative Suite**. My proficiency in **HTML5**, **CSS**, and responsive design ensures that the applications I work on are visually appealing and highly functional across all devices.

In my previous roles, I have successfully facilitated usability testing and implemented data visualization strategies that have improved user engagement by over 30%. My background in full-stack development provides me with a unique perspective on how design influences functionality, enabling effective communication and collaboration within cross-functional teams.

Additionally, I have 8 years of experience in developing high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors with expertise in leading technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have contributed to enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, with a solid understanding of compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
